original_text: For they are wholly given to me from among the people of Israel. Instead of all who open the womb, the firstborn of all the people of Israel, I have taken them for myself.
korean_text: 그들은 이스라엘 자손 중에서 내게 온전히 드린 바 된 자라 이스라엘 자손 중 모든 초태생 곧 모든 처음 태어난 자 대신 내가 그들을 취하였나니

sentences.original_text: For they are wholly given to me
from among the people of Israel.
Instead of all who open the womb,
the firstborn of all the people of Israel,
I have taken them for myself.
